scripts.start: cd server && npm run bots && cd .. && concurrently -n overlay,server,runner "cd overlay && npm run buildpreview" "cd server && npm run build && npm run forever:start" "cd ultimaterunner && npm run build && npm run forever:start -- --realswitch"
scripts.stop: concurrently -n server,runner "cd server && npm run forever:stop" "cd ultimaterunner && npm run forever:stop"
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.dev: cd server && npm run bots && cd ..  && concurrently -n overlay,server,runner "cd overlay && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev" "cd ultimaterunner && npm run dev -- --realswitch"
